title: House goes up in flames due to Kerosene cooker leak
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A unit at a housing complex in Bloemendhal, Colombo went up in flames after a petrol bottle caught fire following a leak in a kerosene cooker, on Sunday (20) evening.
People have opted to purchase fuel, including kerosene, in barrels and bottles due to the shortage, and this in fact poses serious dangers to households.
“They have a son who owns a motorbike. He had purchased fuel in a bottle for future use,” said one local who was a witness to the fire.
